node.title: Reactive Extensions (Rx) - Part 8 - Timeouts
node.description: Should you use Reactive Extensions (Rx) to do timeouts in .NET? It turns out it's better to use CancellationTokenSource in the Task Parallel Library (TPL).

node.title: Logging with Serilog.Exceptions
node.description: Log exception details and custom properties that are not output in Exception.ToString() using Serilog.Exceptions for .NET.

node.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) - Part 4 - INotifyDataErrorInfo
node.description: An base class implementation for the INotifyDataErrorInfo interface. Used in the Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) pattern. Targeted for best performance.

node.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) - Part 3 - INotifyPropertyChanged
node.description: An base class implementation for the INotifyPropertyChanged interface. Used in the Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) pattern. Targeted for best performance.

node.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) - Part 2 - IDisposable
node.description: Implementing IDisposable correctly is ridiculously hard. A Disposable base class can make it easier. Using IDisposable in Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) really helps.

node.title: Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) - Part 1 - Overview
node.description: What really goes into using Model-View-ViewModel (MVVM) in .NET. Base classes for INotifyPropertyChanged, INotifyDataErrorInfo, IDisposable and a lot more.

node.title: GetHashCode Made Easy
node.description: Implementing GetHashCode is hard work and little understood. Learn how to implement GetHashCode as quickly and as simply as possible.
